sentence: The benevolent organization donated thousands to help the needy.

definition: essentially different in kind; not allowing comparison
sentence: The two cultures were so disparate that communication was challenging.

definition: difficult to interpret or understand; mysterious
sentence: The enigmatic smile of the Mona Lisa has captivated viewers for centuries.

definition: too great or extreme to be expressed in words
sentence: The beauty of the sunset was ineffable.

definition: characterized by vulgar or pretentious display; designed to impress or attract notice
sentence: The ostentatious mansion was the talk of the neighborhood.

definition: having developed certain abilities or proclivities at an earlier age than usual
sentence: Her precocious talent for music was evident even as a child.
The behemoth of a truck rumbled down the road.

definition: having or showing a tendency to be easily angered
sentence: His irascible nature made it difficult to work with him.

definition: displaying or having a disinclination for physical exertion or effort; slow and relaxed
sentence: The languid afternoon was perfect for a nap.

definition: a countless or extremely great number
sentence: The night sky was filled with a myriad of stars.
